/>
III.i.2.D.5.c
.
Photocopies of STRs
Photocopies of service treatment records (STRs) are acceptable for rating purposes if examination of the copies confirms they are
genuine, and
free from alteration.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Evidence Requested From the Claimant
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
